g2:c.FUNCTION-DEFINITION.g2:a.TEXT: uil-error-navigation-button-invalid-workspace-dest(wksp-name)=uil-format-user-error("Invalid workspace-destination ([wksp-name]) for uil-navigation-button. The workspace-destination is a symbol that must be the name of a workspace or an object that has a subworkspace.")

uil-error-navigation-button-invalid-kind(kind)=uil-format-user-error("Invalid kind @"[kind]@" for uil-navigation-button. Valid kinds are the symbols HIDE, HELP, GOTO-WORKSPACE, GOTO-SUPERIOR, GOTO-NEXT and GOTO-PREVIOUS.")
uil-internal-error-unknown-callback(nam)= uil-format-user-error ("Unknown button callback @"[nam]@" specified in callback attribute.")

uil-error-cannot-goto-workspace(id)=uil-format-user-error("Cannot show a workspace for uil-navigation-button with id @"[id]@". This navigation button has an invalid workspace-destination attribute and no subworkspace.")
uil-internal-error-unknown-handler(nam)= uil-format-user-error ("Unknown button handler @"[nam]@" specified in uil-handler-method .")
uil-error-grobj-perm(id)=uil-format-user-error("Cannot make UIL graphical object with id @"[id]@" permanent because it is not managed. Call uil-manage-grobj, then call uil-make-grobj-permanent.")

uil-error-radio-button-no-perm(id)=uil-format-user-error("Radio button with id @"[id]@" cannot be made permanent because the radio box it belongs to is transient. You can make the radio box that is @"the-group-master-of@" the radio button permanent.")

uil-error-check-button-no-perm(id)=uil-format-user-error("Check button with id @"[id]@" cannot be made permanent because the check box it belongs to is transient. You can make the check box that is @"the-group-master-of@" the check button permanent.")

uil-error-message-object-no-perm(id)=uil-format-user-error("Message-object with id @"[id]@" cannot be made permanent because the scroll area it belongs to is transient. You can make the scroll area that is @"the-handler-for-the-message-of@" the message object permanent.")
uil-error-module-not-found (mn)=uil-format-user-error("The indicated module [mn] is not loaded.")

upp-is-module-a-non-guide-utility (M) = ( if ( M is gfr or M is gms or M is gmsdemo or M is gxl or M is gxldemo or M is gold or M is goldui or M is gddroot or M is gdddemo or M is gddlib or M is gdddev) then true else false)

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: sdm: this rule needs to exist outside of UILROOT to handle creating labels for old-style navigation buttons. Labels for navigation buttons in UILROOT are allowed only for new-style buttons.

g2:c.PROCEDURE.g2:a.TEXT: uil-is-this-button-grouped-by-this-selection-box (B: item-or-value, BOX: item-or-value) = (truth-value) begin if (BOX is the-group-master-of B) then return TRUE else return FALSE; end

uil-is-this-the-parent-dialog (Child: item-or-value, Parent: item-or-value) = (truth-value) begin if (Parent is the-uil-parent-dialog-of-this-cascaded-dialog Child) then return TRUE else return FALSE; end

uil-is-this-a-child-dialog-of-this-dialog (Child: item-or-value, Parent: item-or-value) = (truth-value) begin if (Child is a-uil-child-cascaded-dialog-of Parent) then return TRUE else return FALSE; end
uil-is-this-dialog-managed-for-this-item (D: item-or-value, I: item-or-value) = (truth-value) begin if (I is the-object-initiating-dialog-activity-for D) then return TRUE else return FALSE; end
uil-is-dialog-managed-on-window (D: item-or-value, W: item-or-value) = (truth-value) begin if (D is a-uil-dialog-presently-in-use-on-window W) then return TRUE else return FALSE; end

uil-get-scroll-area-for-this-message (M: item-or-value) = (item-or-value) SA: item-or-value; begin if (the item SA that is the-handler-for-the-message-of M exists) then return SA else return the symbol item-not-found; end
uil-does-message-belong-to-scroll-area (M: item-or-value, SA: item-or-value) = (truth-value) begin if (M is a-message-belonging-to SA) then return TRUE else return FALSE; end

upp-restrict-text-swiping-for-button-label (T: class uil-text) begin
change the text of the item-configuration of T to "restrict proprietary items as follows : non-menu choices for uil-text exclude: allow-selection-of-text; configure the user interface as follows : unless in administrator or uil-build mode: non-menu choices for uil-text exclude: allow-selection-of-text"
end

g2:c.FUNCTION-DEFINITION.g2:a.TEXT: upp-is-module-a-guide-required-module (M) = ( if ( M is guide or M is guidelib or M is guidesa or M is guislide or M is uil or M is uillib or M is uilsa or M is uilslide or M is uiltdlg or M is uilcombo or M is uildefs or M is uilroot or M is guitools or M is guimove or M is guicolor or M is guiprint or M is guidata or M is guigfr or M is g2cuidev or M is g2uimenu or M is g2uifile or M is g2uitree or M is g2uiprnt or M is guidepro) then true else false)

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT: whenever the label of any uil-navigation-button B receives a value and when (the uil-label-id of B exists and the uil-label-id of B /= "5.0") then start uil-update-button-label (B)

g2:c.PROCEDURE.g2:a.TEXT: utl-get-top-level-workspace-of-this-workspace (WS: class kb-workspace) = (item-or-value) en: symbol; et: text; begin repeat if the item superior to WS exists then begin if the workspace of the item superior to WS exists then WS = the workspace of the item superior to WS else return the symbol unknown; end else return WS; end end on error (en, et) return the symbol unknown; end

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT: whenever any uil-edit-box B is moved by the user then start upp-move-edit-box (B)
whenever the label of any uil-edit-box EB receives a value then start uil-update-edit-box-label (EB)
whenever any uil-text L is moved by the user and when the item that is the-uil-button-owning-this-text-label L exists then start upp-move-label (L)

g2:c.FUNCTION-DEFINITION.g2:a.TEXT: uil-format-internal-error(msg)=" Internal Error in UI Library: [msg]. Please report this error to Gensym Software Support."

g2:c.PROCEDURE.g2:a.TEXT: utl-get-module-owning-this-workspace (WS: class kb-workspace) = (symbol) en: symbol; et: text; begin repeat if the item superior to WS exists then begin if the workspace of the item superior to WS exists then WS = the workspace of the item superior to WS else return the symbol uillib; end else return symbol (the text of the module-assignment of WS); end end on error (en, et) return the symbol unspecified; end

g2:c.RULE.g2:a.TEXT: whenever the label of any uil-button B receives a value and when B is not a uil-navigation-button then start uil-update-button-label (B)

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: SELECT
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the state of the item is enabled and the uil-button-selection-status of the item = the symbol unselected
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: start uil-select-button (the item, this window, the workspace of the item) at priority uil-global-default-procedure-priority

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: SELECT
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the state of the item is enabled and the class of the item is not uil-radio-button and the class of the item is not uil-text-pushbutton
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: start uil-select-button (the item, this window, ({if the item O superior to the workspace of the item exists and O is a uil-dialog then O else} the workspace of the item)) at priority uil-global-default-procedure-priority

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: SELECT
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the state of the item is enabled and the uil-button-selection-status of the item = the symbol unselected
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: start uil-select-button (the item, this window, ({if the item O superior to the workspace of the item exists and O is a uil-dialog then O else} the workspace of the item)) at priority uil-global-default-procedure-priority

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: SELECT
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: the state of the item is enabled and the toggle-state of the item is off
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: start uil-select-button (the item, this window, ({if the item O superior to the workspace of the item exists and O is a uil-dialog then O else} the workspace of the item)) at priority uil-global-default-procedure-priority

g2:c.BORDERLESS-FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Either create a subworkspace of the uil-goto-workspace button or replace guide-navigation-help with the name of the object whose subworkspace is to be shown when the button is pushed.
REPLACE UIL-DEST WITH THE NAME OF THE WORKSPACE YOU WANT TO APPEAR WHEN THE NAVIGATION BUTTON IS PRESSED. YOU CAN ALSO USE THE NAME OF AN OBJECT THAT WHOSE SUBWORKSPACE IS TO BE SHOWN.

g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.LABEL: SELECT
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.CONDITION: (the state of the item is enabled and the uil-stand-alone-text of the item is false and the uil-button that is the-uil-button-owning-this-text-label the item exists and the state of the uil-button that is the-uil-button-owning-this-text-label the item is enabled) and ((the uil-button that is the-uil-button-owning-this-text-label the item is not a uil-text-pushbutton and the uil-button that is the-uil-button-owning-this-text-label the item is not a uil-icon-pushbutton) or ((the uil-button that is the-uil-button-owning-this-text-label the item is a uil-text-pushbutton or the uil-button that is the-uil-button-owning-this-text-label the item is a uil-icon-pushbutton) and (the uil-button-selection-status of the uil-button that is the-uil-button-owning-this-text-label the item is unselected)))
g2:c.USER-MENU-CHOICE.g2:a.ACTION: start uil-select-text (the item, this window) at priority uil-global-default-procedure-priority

g2:c.METHOD.g2:a.TEXT: upp-replace-template-with-grobj (Itm : class guide-root, Wksp : class kb-workspace, X : integer, Y : integer) = (symbol) begin return the symbol none; end
